name: Fitzzle Wise Owls
description: Fitzzle Wise Owls is a unique expansion of the classic jigsaw puzzle style games. Instead of frustratingly trying to match oddly shaped pieces, Fitzzle uses squares but maintains the fun puzzle completion goals you would experience with a jigsaw puzzle.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 500 MB
